1179280.name: PROJECT D : Human Risen
1179280.description:
The year is 2022, earth hit by terror of extinction, a new virus called D-VIRUS spread fast enough to trigger human extinction. To prevent human extinction, researchers from all over the world gathered to find solution, after a long discussion, they name their project as Doomsday Project. This project have purpose to save humanity by trained people who have potential to survive by teach them basic survival in that matter. The scientist will also build a time-capsule for these survival candidate in hope they’ll have some time to let the virus goes down after a few years when they’re sleeping in the time-capsule.

But, in 2023, this project leaked to public, causing panic in the world, people demand a mass production of this so called time-capsule. Due to the minimal amount of resources they have to build this time-capsule, the scientist decide to move this project to an island away from civilization.

Will they survive? Will these people save the world? What’s exactly this virus is? Is this virus will bring death to our planet earth?

AirShip

As for your concern, because this game will have many islands to explore we also provide you with a unique transportation, an airship to accompany you in your journey. This Airship will become as your second home or your flying home. You can add some survival tool for your airship like Aquarium, Planter, and many more. Don’t forget, you need to repair your airship if serious injury happen to her. Have a nice trip!​
Airship can also be used as a ship if it runs out of fuel and store vehicles in the airship.

Vehicle & Driving System

Players can make vehicles such as buggies and bikes by collecting parts that can be found on the beach and other locations. vehicles can be used to bring goods collected from the island, or to be safer from wild animals / mutations. But be aware, some islands are not vehicles friendly because some islands have extreme conditions to be passed by vehicles.

PET Mode / Taming Mode And Riding System

Friendly animal is a yes-yes to tame, Vicious animal need to be fed first to gain more trust with players, players can also use them to stand-ground protecting your camp, some animal will also allow you to ride them, like horses.

Various islands

Players can explore various islands, ranging from islands with dense forests, tropical forests, snow islands, volcanic islands,desert island, etc., and not only that we will also present islands with forests that have been mutated due to virrus. for islands with mutated forests will be added when reaching the goal.

Dynamic Weather and Day-Night Cycle

Experience a beautiful day-night cycle and variety of weather. Various kinds of weather such as thunderstorms, sunny, light rain, heavy rain, snow, etc.

Craft, Build & Learn Table

MAKE YOUR OWN HOUSE! Outside world is scary! at the beginning the player can't make everything, the player has to research the items they find then put them in the learn table, from here you will learn to find new crafting recipes

SEA & Underwater

Players can swim to look for fish at sea but keep in mind not all fish can be eaten, some are poisonous and some are dangerous.​ Players can also make small boats to look for food.

Inventory, Storage, Hotbar, Wearable

Don’t forget to do some looting though, your need is your priority too! And also, Store some to loot some! create some storage container to store your items before doing an expedition.

Various weapons & Dual wield

You can also make various types of weapons such as bamboo spears, arrows, wooden knives, etc. Firearms can also be made or found in several places.

Smartwatch

The player will see character data on the watch and can set an alarm

Other features

  • TPS & FPS View
  • There is an air bunker that is still a mystery, you can explore by airship
  • Do Solo or play with friends with story mode to explore more fun
  • Use stealth to avoid enemies or engage them directly with raw weapons built from sticks, stones and more.
  • Solve the mystery of the D VIRUS.
  • Chop down trees to build a camp or start a fire to keep warm. Scavenge food to keep yourself from starving.
  • Raise some animal as a livestock so you won't starve to death due to lack of resources
  • use your Airship to fish some fishes, and raise it on your air ship
  • Settle on an island and construct a shelter or venture the seas with your own built raft.
  • Manage your vitals of hunger, thirst, blood, and health against the harshness of mother nature.
  • Various kinds of weather and snow islands, cities and underwater islands
  • More than 50 types of animals that you can hunt, and there are new animals because of the effects of the virus
1179280.supported_languages:
英语*, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 芬兰语, 日语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
